alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 25 at 12:56AM EDT until August 25 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM EDT FOR EASTERN TRUMBULL...NORTHEASTERN MAHONING AND SOUTHERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 1256 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Andover to near Kinsman to near Lordstown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Warren, Meadville, Boardman, Niles, Campbell, Hubbard, Cortland, Titusville, Lordstown, Linesville, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Adamsville, Maplewood Park, Pymatuning Central, Harmonsburg, Guys Mills, Atlantic and Pymatuning North. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
